Standard/Regulation Name: New York State Department of Financial Services Cybersecurity Requirements
Description: Regulation on the minimum cybersecurity standards required of financial services companies operating in New York state.

Standard/Regulation Name: National Institute of Standards and Technology Cybersecurity Framework
Description: Framework that provides guidelines for organizations to better manage and reduce cybersecurity risk.

Standard/Regulation Name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
Description: Security standard that sets requirements for companies that handle branded credit cards from the major card schemes.

Standard/Regulation Name: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
Description: Regulation that sets national standards for the privacy and security of protected health information.

Standard/Regulation Name: Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program
Description: Program that provides a standardized approach to security assessment, authorization, and continuous monitoring for cloud products and services used by the federal government.
